amendment.description: To require lobbyist to distinguish whether clients are public or private entities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2961 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2961 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S2491-2493, S2499; text: CR S2492) To require lobbyist to distinguish whether clients are public or private entities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2961 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2961 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Cornyn.
